table_description: Individuals or teams that are responsible for code in a repository.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: The full name of the repository, including the owner and repo name.

columns.name: line
columns.description: The rule's line number in the CODEOWNERS file.

columns.name: pattern
columns.description: The pattern used to identify what code a team, or an individual is responsible for

columns.name: users
columns.description: Users responsible for code in the repo

columns.name: teams
columns.description: Teams responsible for code in the repo

columns.name: pre_comments
columns.description: Specifies the comments added above a key.

columns.name: line_comment
columns.description: Specifies the comment following the node and before empty lines.
